channel.title: Newgrounds Audio Portal for Android app
channel.description:
Good evening! This is the Newgrounds Audio Portal app!
[b]What is this?[/b] This app is the Newgrounds Audio Portal app. It allows you to browse the audio portal and play the songs. You can browse every category, browse *EVERY* page in every category, etc. You can search for songs (which gives 100 results, which should be plenty), and you can add songs to a list of favorites! In the future, after release, there will be the ability to DOWNLOAD songs directly to your phone!
[b]But what is the Newgrounds Audio Portal?[/b] The Newgrounds Audio Portal is a place where indie musicians may upload their music for community review.
[b]I have an iPhone, what about me?[/b] Well, I don't do iPhone development, but there is an app for the iPhone as well. I hear it's not so great, however; it costs $1 and it only has the top 5 songs of the week. Or so I hear.
[b]How much does this app cost?[/b] It's free! There will be no ads, no cost, NOTHING. This is entirely, 100%, without a doubt, free.
[b]Where do I download it?[/b] Search for "Newgrounds" on the Marketplace OR click [url=https://market.android.com/details?id=com.newgrounds.audio]Here![/url]

item.title: Newgrounds Audio Portal for Android app
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

this would be fantastic if i had an android phone, i love the NAP
